messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM

On Tue, Jan 17, 2012 at 2:16 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go
>
>
> Description:
> utf8.String: move to exp/utf8string.String
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5528115/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5528115/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M doc/go1.html
>  M doc/go1.tmpl
>  M src/buildscript/darwin_386.sh
>  M src/buildscript/darwin_amd64.**sh
>  M src/buildscript/freebsd_386.sh
>  M src/buildscript/freebsd_amd64.**sh
>  M src/buildscript/linux_386.sh
>  M src/buildscript/linux_amd64.sh
>  M src/buildscript/linux_arm.sh
>  M src/buildscript/netbsd_386.sh
>  M src/buildscript/netbsd_amd64.**sh
>  M src/buildscript/openbsd_386.sh
>  M src/buildscript/openbsd_amd64.**sh
>  M src/buildscript/plan9_386.sh
>  M src/buildscript/windows_386.sh
>  M src/buildscript/windows_amd64.**sh
>  A src/pkg/exp/utf8string/**Makefile
>  A src/pkg/exp/utf8string/_**testmain.go
>  M src/pkg/exp/utf8string/string.**go
>  M src/pkg/exp/utf8string/string_**test.go
>  M src/pkg/unicode/utf8/Makefile
>  M test/alias.go
>
>
>

*** Submitted as f891d14d88e2 ***

utf8.String: move to exp/utf8string.String

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5528115

subject: code review 5528115: utf8.String: move to exp/utf8string.String
